creator: SendGroupSMS.com Bulk SMS Software
descriptionHtml:
This app is the collection of all Mobile phone Touch Screen problems troubleshooting steps and Tips & tricks for Android based cell Phone and Tabs as well as Apple iOS based iPhone and iPad etc. What to do if your mobile phone screen freezes and stops responding? Or you accidently dropped your phone and mobile screen was broken and touch not working at all. Recuing your data in this situation might be a challenge. We have compiled all such cases and provided a number of solutions for you.

Some of the topics are:

* How to Forcefully Restart when your phone freezes and won’t turn off
* Tips to fix when your phone freezes and won’t turn ON
* Tips to Resolve Your Device unresponsive Touchscreen Problems
* Tips to Fix Touch Screen Not Working Problem on Android
* Tips to protect your device data when Touch Screen is Non-Responsive
* Resolve a issue if your Android device screen is overly sensitive
* Unlock Android Device with a Dead Screen
* Unlock Android Phone with a Broken Screen
* Change the Pointer Speed in Android devices
* Improve touch screen sensitivity on android smartphones
* Mobile Input Types
* Set the default keyboard on your Android phone
* Turn off predictive text on Android
* Types of Keyboards in Android phone
* Solution: Unfortunately Android Keyboard Has Stopped
* Adjust 3D Touch Sensitivity on iPhone
* Tips to Fix iPhone touch Screen issues
descriptionShort: Troubleshooting Help Tips Tricks of Mobile Phone Touch Screen issues Data Rescue

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Improved user interface and minor fixes.
